content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or beliefs. However, diplomacy and peaceful conflict resolution should ideally always be the focus of international relations for the betterment of society. Unfortunately, the emphasis given to diplomacy can vary depending on circumstances and the interests of nations involved in a conflict. However, diplomacy is always necessary, and history shows that peaceful resolutions almost always have better outcomes than wars or violent conflicts. It is essential for nations to put aside personal interests and work towards a common goal of global peace and prosperity. Diplomacy plays a vital role in achieving this goal.
